sentence.Network_en: All the details are correct, including the artillery badge on the shako front.

像 NT$60 的比目鱼鳍边肉，就十分划算，海鲜沙拉内有虾蛄(Shako)也算物有所值。虽然不太会用上进口材料，但也是不错的本地渔获。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: via French from Hungarian csákó (süveg) 'peaked (cap'), from csák 'peak', from German Zacken 'spike'
